mapper.insert: insert into chatmessage ( chatRoomNo, senderNo, content, receiverNo ) values ( #{chatRoomNo}, #{senderNo}, #{content}, #{receiverNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT *, CASE WHEN senderNo = #{senderNo} THEN 'R' ELSE 'L' end as flag FROM chatmessage where chatRoomNo = #{chatRoomNo} order by sendtime desc limit 20;
